refnamediv.refpurpose: Ground station hardware that receives an RF signal.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A Ground Station needs a Receiver to receive the RF signal from ground station user spacecraft. A Receiver is assigned on the AddHardware list of an instance of a GroundStation.

refsection.title: Fields
refsection.para: The Receiver resource has no fields.

informalexample.para: Create and configure a Receiver object.
